name: 10s To Decide - Ludum Dare 51
description:
Works best in full screen. After launching the game, click the  icon in the bottom right.

Game build in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51, with the theme "Every 10 seconds".

It's a Tower Defence with:

  • 4 towers
  • 4 enemies
    • Enemy scaling - more enemies can be included in spawns every 20 rounds, and tough enemies appear after round 50.
  • 17~ upgrades, which can be researched multiple times

Engine: Unity
Art: Aseprite (with my eyes closed)
Sound: cfxr
Code: https://github.com/Rob6566/-LudumDare51
